pregnancy by using contraceptives. Granting exceptions of this kind does not
provide the basis for an absolute right to an abortion, but it does move things
away from a “pro-life” position in the direction of a “pro-choice” position.
THESTATUS  OF  THEFETUS.So far we have assumed for the sake of argu-
ment  that  a  human  fetus  is  a  human  being.  But  pro-choice  liberals  often
deny this premise. It may seem hard to deny that a human fetus is human.
After all,
